org.dotplot.image
Class QImage

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.image.QImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
MonitorablePlotUnit
public class QImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements MonitorablePlotUnit

The QImage gets the 2D-Floatingpoint-Array of the QMatrix and paints it on the screen. The maxX value represents the width of the Matrix, the maxY value the heigth.

Author:
Tobias Gesellchen
